feedItems.title: Fish Five-0: Is It Even Grixis?
feedItems.description: Gyruda, Doom of Depths really enforces the "Don't get mad, get even" saying.

feedItems.title: We Recant Our Previous Ikoria Digital Statement
feedItems.description:
This week, Gaby and Mashi revisit their assumptions about Ikoria, and surprisingly come to the conclusion that it may actually be a better experience in paper than digital.

The post We Recant Our Previous Ikoria Digital Statement appeared first on ChannelFireball - Magic: The Gathering Strategy, Singles, Cards, Decks.

feedItems.title: FNM at Home, With Your Local Store, And on MTG Arena
feedItems.description: Announcing Friday Night Magic at Home, featuring events and rewards that connect players with the MTG community during this difficult time.

feedItems.title: Weekly Winners 2020 - 16
feedItems.description:
This week we see less influence from Ikoria spoilers and more from brewing and EDH. Also, the effects of the pandemic seem on the magic market don't seem big (yet).

Like every week, just in time for (digital) FNM, I'll now tell you about the cards that will be the talk of the (digital) town tonight!

feedItems.title: Playing Magic with Friends When You Can't Gather
feedItems.description: Gavin talks about best Magic practices for keeping in touch with friends while social distancing and setting up games of Magic over webcam.
